name: Wired-Down to the wire
description:
WIRED or Down to the Wire is a simple game where you are a robot tasked with going around and defusing explosives that the other evil robots have set! Avoid their patrols, collect powerups and click on the corresponding blue buttons to defuse bombs and save the day! 

Controls: W,A,S,D Arrow keys or Analog Stick to move. . 

Defuse bombs by clicking on the blue buttons! Avoid hitting the red ones and the robot patrols!

Code Developed by: Journolud,  Lloydo

Music Composed by: Llyodo

Art and resource management by: olifire

Animations by: olifire

Wired is a beginner dev project for the Straight Up Gruntled Jam that was made by 3 individuals who came together in 15 days to try to create something together.  ~lloydo, olifire,  journolud

We are hoping to build upon this concept and make some updates monthly. Make sure to keep your eyes peeled for updates and devlogs. ~lloydo, olifire,  journolud
